name: Helios Fairfax Partners Corporation Subordinate Voting Shares
longDescription: Helios Fairfax Partners Corp is an investment holding company whose investment objective is to achieve long term capital appreciation while preserving capital, by investing in public and private equity securities and debt instruments in Africa and African businesses. It is also engaged in property and casualty insurance and reinsurance business.

It is also engaged in property and casualty insurance and reinsurance business.
fullAddress: 95 Wellington Street West,Suite 800, Toronto, ON, CA
